get_point_at_given_distance_on_shortest_path(dst_node_id, distance)[source]

Returns node at just before given distance on minimum path to given destination node.

Parameters

  • dst_node_id (int,) – The node to start computing predecessors from.

  • distance (float,) – The distance to aim for.

Raises

ValueError – If the predecessors vector was not requested.
